titleInfo.title: USA v. Brown
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER appointing Michael J. Hansen for Damien D. Brown. Signed by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester on 9/28/2005. (CS, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER appointing Michael J. Hansen for Damien D. Brown. Signed by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester on 9/28/2005. (CS, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Brown
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Damien D. Brown. It is ordered that: (1) This case, insofar as it concerns this defendant, is removed from the trial docket based upon the request of the defendant. (2) A hearing on the defendant's anticipated plea of guilty is scheduled before Magistrate Judge Piester on the 2nd day of November, 2005, at the hour of 9:00 a.m., in Courtroom No. 2, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall, North, Lincoln, Nebraska.(3) On or before the date set for the plea proceeding, counsel for plaintiff and for defendant shall provide to the assigned probation officer their respective versions of the offense for purposes of preparing the presentence investigation report. (4) For this defendant, the time between today's date and the hearing on the anticipated plea of guilty is excluded for purposes of computing the limits under the Speedy Trial Act. See 18 U.S.C. sec. 3161(h)(1)(I)&(h)(8)(A)(B).***Change of Plea Hearing set for 11/2/2005 09:00 AM in Courtroom 2 (Lincoln) before Magistrate Judge David L. Piester; XT excludable started 11/1/2005-11/2/2005; termed 12/5/2005 trial date. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 11/1/2005. (KLL, )

Piester; XT excludable started 11/1/2005-11/2/2005; termed 12/5/2005 trial date. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 11/1/2005. (KLL, )

titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to defendant Damien D. Brown. It is ordered that the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects; ETC.Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/12/2006. (KLL, )

extension.docketText: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to defendant Damien D. Brown. titleInfo.title: USA v. Brown
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Damien D. Brown (1). Count 1, Defendant pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of thirty-seven (37) months; three (3) years Supervised Release with Special Conditions; $100 Special Assessment as to defendant(s) Damien D. Brown. Four (4) certified copies to USM. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/26/2006. (GJG, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

Brown. Four (4) certified copies to USM. Signed by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/26/2006. (GJG, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Brown
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Damien D. Brown. On the court's own motion, and to accommodate a change in the undersigned's schedule, IT IS ORDERED that Defendant Brown's revocation hearing is rescheduled to 4:00 p.m. on Friday, May 1, 2009, before the undersigned United States district judge, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. The defendant shall be present unless excused by the court. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )
